posts.post_content:
First post, hopefully I’m doing this right. Want to trade FOR my first Cobb, preferably a low grade that presents well. Mainly interest in Bat Off or either Portrait. I generally collect lower grade cards that punch above their technical grade, looking for the same here

What I have to trade:
1953 Topps Mickey Mantle SGC 2 (dead centered)
1956 Jackie Robinson PSA 6 (centered)
T206 Walter Johnson Hands At Chest SGC 2.5
T206 Cy Young Glove Showing BVG 4

I’d love to make a deal without having to trade the few T206’s I have but for the right deal I’d do it. Don’t have any vouches on here given that I’m new but I do from other sites, or I’m happy to do the trade through Veriswap. Thanks!
Great cards, good luck with the trade. From your screen name I’m assuming you’re from the Dallas area. Me too - always good to find more locals on here.

[quote name="Cmvorce" post=2451442]Great cards, good luck with the trade. From your screen name I’m assuming you’re from the Dallas area. Me too - always good to find more locals on here.[/QUOTE] Thank you and hello Dallas neighbor!
